hyp: The fat of the cow is another example of the result of acidic or chemical action.
src: Owalwa ya dikovi ibhiluka kifwa kyengi kitunda mu asido mba dimatekenu (aicino) o ima ya kimiku.
tgt: The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is.
label: Hallucination

hyp: No child should grow up in an environment that is stimulating, educational, or otherwise successful.
src: Nisciun figgeu o dovieiva mai cresce int’un ambiente che o no segge stimolante, de cua e educativo, ma succede.
tgt: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
label: Hallucination

hyp: Nor does it have the right to refuse interstate tax and tariff laws.
src: Ia juga tidak mempunyai hak untuk menolak undang-undang cukai dan tarif antara negeri.
tgt: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
label: Not Hallucination

hyp: The advantage of most insects is that they can attach their fins to the body.
src: Бартарии аксари ҳашаротҳо дар он мебошад, ки болҳои худро дар танаи баданашон маҳкам карда метавонанд.
tgt: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.
label: Hallucination

hyp: Originally Paris was considered the modern fashion capital of the world, Constantinople was considered the fashion capital of the European Union.
src: اوليهڽ ڤاريس ديڤينندوي جادي ايبو كوتا مودي دونيا كوتيمڤورير، كونستنتينوڤل ديأڠڬڤ جادي ايبو كوتا مودي ايروڤا فياودل.
tgt: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
label: Not Hallucination
